name: Holy Symbol
description: A Holy Symbol is a representation of a god or pantheon. A Cleric or Paladin can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus. To use the symbol in this way, the caster must hold it in hand, wear it visibly, or bear it on a Shield.

variants.name: Amulet
variants.description: A pendant or medallion bearing a holy symbol, worn around the neck.

variants.name: Emblem
variants.description: A holy symbol embossed or engraved on a Shield or similar surface.

variants.name: Reliquary
variants.description: A small box or container holding a sacred relic, used as a focus for divine spells.
